title: Feats
content:
eats will depend on how long it takes you to gain four levels of a class. This means that single-class characters will always gain three feats in Baldur's Gate 3, but multi-class characters, unless they multi-class every four levels or at eight levels and four levels, will only gain two feats.

For instance, if they take something like seven levels of Paladin and five levels of Warlock, they would only gain two feats. So, they lose out a little bit unless they hit these exact breakpoints of eigh
